metadata.name: Active Directory Group Enumeration With Get-AdGroup
metadata.comment: Detects usage of the "Get-AdGroup" cmdlet to enumerate Groups within Active Directory

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-adgroup ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-filter')))

output.summary: Detects usage of the "Get-AdGroup" cmdlet to enumerate Groups within Active Directory
